title: Pixel 4a Adaptive battery
content:
I have had it for about a month with adaptive battery always on. I am having horrible issues with notifications not showing up in time. I have gone through and turned off battery optimization for all the apps I would like to be notified right away.
Even after doing this I will sit my phone down at work right next to me and not get any notifications for a while. As soon as I pick up the phone and unlock they all flood in, even the non optimized ones.
Anyone have any suggestions? Would turning off battery optimization kill my battery?
